# [Interview #575: TOM Signing Report - Ted Herman, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=575#6)

#### Question

Will everyone win at Snakes and Foxes now?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Nothing has changed about the game now.
